problem.markdown:
1. Which amongst the following are not defined in case of a rotating link?
() Total Acceleration () Centripetal Acceleration () Tangetial Acceleration (x) All mentioned accelerations are defined
2. Angular acceleration of input link rotating with a constant angular velocity is ?
() unity (x) zero () not defined () can not be determined without link length
3. Tangential Acceleration at a point on a link is not proportional to ?
() Radial distance to the point on the link (x) Angular Velocity of the link () Angular acceleration of the link () None of these
4. Centripetal Acceleration at a point on a link does not depend on ?
(x) Angular acceleration of the link () Angular Velocity of the link () None of these () Radial distance to the point on the link
5. Tangential Acceleration at a point on a link ?
() is at 45o to the link in the direction of motion () is parallel to the link (x) is perpendicular to the link () None of these
